name: ReportInstance

methods.name: getCompletionDate
methods.description: Returns the date and time when the instance of the report finished running. The completion date is available only if the report instance ran successfully or couldnâ€™t be run because of an error. Date and time information is in ISO-8601 format.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique ID for an instance of a report that was run asynchronously.

methods.name: getOwnerId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the user who created the report instance.

methods.name: getReportId
methods.description: Returns the unique ID of the report this instance is based on.

methods.name: getReportResults
methods.description: Retrieves results for an instance of an asynchronous report. When you request your report, you can specify whether to summarize data or include details.

methods.name: getRequestDate
methods.description: Returns the date and time when an instance of the report was run. Date and time information is in ISO-8601 format.

methods.name: getStatus
methods.description: Returns the status of a report.

description: Returns an instance of a report that was run asynchronously.
